title: 14-day suspension
body:
So I have received honor after honor through the thousands of games I've played... I get in a game with a premade that bans my champ and calls mid for themselves. (big deal, I'll top) after I pick my secondary champ (Trundle) They say they're going top. Nope, they are going top. So We don't have a jg now, since he went top start of game. I'm assuming by them bitching constantly in pre-game that they wanted me to dodge but I didn't want the timer so I went with it.

I start the game, go bot and they literally bait me for a death, my own team. Cool. I go bot again and I legit died but it was my own fault for that one. 

As the game goes on our singed feeds his ass off, and I not being a good trundle to begin with and stuck bot am getting destroyed. 
EVEN THE ENEMY TEAM WAS SAYING SORRY TO ME ABOUT THEM TROLLING. 
After game the pre-made reports me and I get a 14-day suspension. 

Can anyone from RIOT please take a look at the chat that game or even replay the game and see, please? This is annoying that pre-mades can have that kinda power...

Thanks kindly

replies.body:
You're roleplaying Trundle really well.
13 deaths, didn't spend a single gold, giving first blood under enemy tower + a few more kills.
Sure, you're the victim of a trolling premade ...
Hopefully you get a perma ;^)

First death was next to tower north of it, team went in for the person coming down and they ran away when I started attacking. Two people used flash to get out of it even faster. Then the singed feeds a lot and I just couldn't keep going. So good job basing your opinion off not even 1/3 the facts, kid.

And forgetting to buy and item in the beginning cause I was focused on rushing to the gank.
After that I died again AND THEN NOTICED I didn't have any items. By then the chat log as well as singed dying on purpose would give you an indication as to why my mood for that round was shot to even play.

Okay, so what you're saying is, that you started attacking someone under the enemy tower... while people were on the way. 
But you were already under the enemy tower?
I mean, okay, maybe that's a point for you, because you tock like  44 Seconds for the first death ;D

> And forgetting to buy and item in the beginning cause I was focused on rushing to the gank.

whoops you made a mistake

> And forgetting to buy and item in the beginning cause I was focused on inting to the gank.

Okay, explain:
How do you forget to purchase items for the whole 16m.51s game?
Huh? 
I mean, I don't care, you got a ban, so i'm happy.
But would still love to know your excuse ;D


> After that I died again AND THEN NOTICED I didn't have any items. 

Wait, you knew you had no items, but ... you never fixed it?

It is really unfortunate that you had such a poor game experience with teammates  who weren't as teammatey as they could of been! I recently received a 14 day ban after having a tough game and a player unhappy with me reported me!  However after speaking with Riot support they dug into it for me and saw that I was trying to win the game even though my allies said I wasn't, and they overturned the ban. 

The best thing you can do in this scenario may be to contact Riot Support staff through a ticket or a live chat session if you believe you have been wrongly suspended so they may review your case!   Make sure to be as thorough as possible!

Looking at his match history, I believe this is not a false punishment case. He as the trundle died 13 times, dealt less than 300 damage total, got only one cs and his total vision score is 4. I doubt he is innocent
If only you could have seen the chat log, and look at the singed.

They would not matter. You are responsible for your actions. It is a game, not an In real life hostage situation, you always had a choice and you chose to respond by being worse than they could be. Your actions = Your responsibility.
Thank you! I'll give them a message!

If there are chat logs when you sign in and you want community input as to how you could have handled yourself better post the logs.

If you want a manual review of the game then submit a ticket to support.

EDIT: I would like to mention that premade reports are exactly the same as individual reports. Either you were reported and the game is reviewed or you were not and it is not. Being reported multiple times in a single game does not make the system review you any harder.
Send a ticket to riot with chat log
